website_summaries.verdict: For soccer players who prefer a traditional ball with classic appeal, this ball delivers despite a few minor gripes. It's also a good value, no matter which size you choose.
pros: This brand has a reputation for making sports gear with excellent quality
Ball sports a classic soccer ball design
cons: Some confusion about whether the ball comes inflated or deflated, as consumers have received them in both conditions

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for a non-traditional use: my miniature donkey LOVES to roll and toss balls, and slightly deflated soccer balls seem to be easiest for him to grab. We've had this one for several months now, and it has withstood his rough play extremely well. In fact, I'm back to buy another so we have a backup in case our first gets lost. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AWS

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Never seen that bad quality before. This is how it looks like after one week of used by 8 year old kid.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Guru

customer_reviews.title: Very Round
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I was expecting it to be this round, but let me tell you, it is almost perfectly spherical. I've rolled it in many directions without any issue. I'm looking forward to testing it with my feet once I find the right shoes.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a counterfeit ball. After only a few uses the ball started cracking and the Wilson label is completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fabiola Rios

customer_reviews.title: the balls are very good and extremely durable. I like the weight and feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought three and used them for juggling, shooting practice and kicking against a wall. I juggled 90,000 times in 3 months, and shot many times on goal and kicked against walls. These are very durable. I look for durability in practice balls and these are superb. I wonder if Wilson has the newer cover pattern with the same internal structure in any model of ball. It would be wise to do that for the sake of staying current. I love the feel when kicking. Variable amounts of air can be used based on personal preference while practicing. A little less air allows a more forgiving bounce while juggling.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed in the cosmetics of the ball
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in the cosmetics of the ball. I ordered three to ship in the Christmas shoe-boxes so had to remove them from their boxes and deflate them. Each ball had a light brownish stain about 4 inches in diameter. I don't know if they had been sitting in a warehouse for some time or what, but the stain was fairly visible. I figured they were get a lot dirtier within the first few days of use but still did not like sending them with this cosmetic defect.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cook

customer_reviews.title: VERY tough soccer ball.
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY tough soccer ball. My Siberian Husky likes to play soccer and usually we only get to play with an inflated soccer ball for a day or so before psssst and then we play with a squished ball. This ball has yet to pop despite her teeth routinely getting stuck. I almost wish it would pop but it doesn't. If you are hard on soccer balls this is the ball you want.
customer_reviews.author: beer234

customer_reviews.title: Replacement soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: The first Wilson soccer ball would not hold air and Amazon replaced immediately, the replacement ball looked great except it had a paper sticker on it that was hiding a 2" slice that went through the outer vinyl skin....I covered it with electrical tape....It's hard not to think the sticker was put there on purpose to hide the cut..... I really hope Americans never have to get our medications from China!!!!! We need to get back to making good quality stuff here in the US...I am not going for another replacement, as my Grandson needs the ball now.... Dave Murray
customer_reviews.author: David S Murray

customer_reviews.title: Check air often before return period closes!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 5 balls and 3 were inflated and 2 wasn’t. I put air in the deflated ones and checked a checked them a few hours later. All seemed good then placed them in storage bag until we needed them (about a month later) an two were flat again. Now one won’t holed any air and the other maybe a few hours. They wasn’t even used except for a bounce check. Return window closed so you need to check regularly. The other three are holding up so far after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: ARJ

customer_reviews.title: Questionable "Proof of Delivery"
customer_reviews.text: I received a emessage from Amazon telling me my package was delivered. I checked and it had been, however the message also stated that the package had been handed to the recipient -- this was not a true statement. I live alone and I was home all day - no one handed me anything. The package was left by my front door. Now, I have no problem with the delivery, but your proof of delivery leaves a lot to be desired. This has also happened on other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The future soccer player loved it.
customer_reviews.text: We have a neighbor next door, a very nice young boy, who received the soccer ball. It was just the right size. My husband, a soccer addict, thought he would like one. it was well received and just the right size. It is so nice to be able to turn to Amazon for just the right thing. Our sports stores are closing and I would have had to drive around trying to find one just the right size. Once again, Amazon came thru.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Vasilj

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soccer ball roughly 3 months ago, we play once a week only and the stitches are already coming out, really bad quality ball. Do not recommend, you'll be wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Stitching falling apart after very little use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in September so my then 3-year-old could start learning a little bit about soccer. Between weather and some family issues we had barely used it. Early the following May, which I believe was about the fourth time she had actually tried to play with it, the stitching started coming apart. You can tell from the picture that she spent more time putting stickers on it than actually kicking it around. Seems like Wilson quality isn't anything like it used to be based off this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amy2301

customer_reviews.title: Size 3 for medium sized dogs and younger children
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our corgi. He absolutely loves them. Pleasantly surprised by the quality as I wasn’t expecting much due to the price. We bought two in anticipation of a short lifespan, but so far it has outlived the one we previously had (Franklin brand) Will purchase again once he eventually destroys these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Worse Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 or 3 practices, the ball had ruptured a seam and was egg shaped. I sent an email to Wilson customer service requesting a replacement ball. I got a response that they had received my email and were working on it. A few days later I got another response asking me to fill out a survey of my customer service experience. You can guess how I responded. No further communication has been made by them. A phone call to their customer service was fruitless as well. I gave up after 10 minutes of "Press x to go here" menus. This is the last Wilson product I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chappie

customer_reviews.title: Shoe box stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to send in OCC boxes along with a pump. While they took up a lot of space in the shoe boxes, I'm told soccer balls are always a huge hit. These seemed like decent quality for the price. Hoping they hold up well for their recipients.
customer_reviews.author: Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Having a ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old to play and practice soccer in the backyard. I'm not a soccer guy, just wasnt my sport as a kid. I wasnt even aware of the different sizes in balls for different ages. Bought this and seems perfect for my daughter. Came inflated and after 2 months of use has held up perfect. Nothing better as a father than enjoying some outside fun with my daughter. Now I'm learning to enjoy a brand new sport thru her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It has deflated and air comes out of all the stitching!
customer_reviews.text: my son loves to play soccer so I bought him this ball and to my dismay it was useless as soon as we started playing with it. I added air and immediately it lost it so i covered it with soap and tried it again and the entire ball bubbled when I pumped air into it. waste of my money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine11

customer_reviews.title: REGULATION SIZE AND WEIGHT for kids under 8 years old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grand nephew for Christmas. What a beautiful soccer ball AND we feel good about him having a 'regulation' size and weight for his age (under 8 years old). I was really impressed with the ball and think our young nephew will really enjoy it. Sometimes when a younger player uses equipment for older kids or grown men they will become frustrated because it's really hard to learn with something too large for them. I feel great about gifting our cute little nephew with this ball and hope he enjoys it for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. & Deborah Dannels

customer_reviews.title: ADIDAS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spherical truncated icosahedron, not to be confused with a spherical polyhedron and/or the commonly known n-gonal hosohedron. Brings joy to the most serious of us, once you begin interaction you will experience an emotional reaction, typically the corner of the mount turned up with the front teeth slightly exposed - you may be unfamiliar with this expression, b.c. (before corona) it was commonly seen on the faces of humans, due to face coverings a.c. you may no longer observe one outdoors. However if you observe someone playing with a spherical truncated icosahedron, its safe to assume they are smiling under their face covering.
customer_reviews.author: Kuangbao

customer_reviews.title: A "Wow" gift for a child who has none.
customer_reviews.text: These balls are being sent in Christmas gift boxes to children in many parts of the world. They arrived as advertised, deflated, making packing easier. Quality is good. Excited to think what the receiving child will think. A truly "Wow" gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Heart

customer_reviews.title: Not really a dog toy.  :)  But a good ball.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great soccer ball, but we got it as a dog toy and he's started pulling the leather off. Otherwise, it's a good size and he'd kick it around initially because it would not fit in his mouth until he'd managed to bite it a few time so air was less. If your pup does not chew everything up and you want to play soccer with the dog.... it's a good ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smiles

customer_reviews.title: This ball didn't even last one month!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my grandson. I received it on July 18, 2020. Today is August 7, 2020. My husband and I played soccer with him using this ball at most 10 times. For no more than 1 hr at a time. My grandson is 4 years old and I am 71 years old, so you know we were not playing rough. Today the ball was flat. My husband tried inflating it, with no luck. My grandson was soo disappointed. And so was I! I can't imagine having to buy a ball per month, so that we can play. I am going to contact Wilson on Monday. I'll let you all know what they had to say.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a good inexpensive soccer ball! My two toddlers like this ball, and it's been pretty beat up outside without losing any air. I should be mildly ashamed to admit that a large part of choosing this particular ball was a review that stated her miniature donkey loves to play with it, but I'm not. (I'm not sure how a donkey loving it should translate into my kids loving it, but it's hilarious!) This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Two Years of Normal Use
customer_reviews.text: Used by my 12YO daughter for her 2016 and 2017 fall soccer seasons for ten 90 minute practices and 4 games per season. Stitching ripped out at the end of the 2017 season, so we got about 40 hours of active use (no abuse). Very nice ball until then. Final judgement: A very nice ball for less than $10 that lasted two seasons = A good buy. As others have said, the ball itself is padded so it feels good when you kick it even when firmly inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Monica in CA

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: For just playing in backyard and around the house With our 3 and 11yo kids, this has lasted well over a year. Great purchase for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: jkrispies

customer_reviews.title: Very low durability, not worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: The seams of the ball were showing before I even used it. They ripped and broke after just the third use (all uses were on a grass field and netted goals). If you're buying soccer balls, get an Adidas or Nike for a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart with daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart very quickly. First layer is off and seems are split.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Response for Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks good but one of the balls was defective. It was replaced immediately with no questions asked. I would recommend purchasing these based on the quick response. I do not know how durable they are since we sent these in Christmas boxes to children overseas via Samaritan's purse.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: There were three sizes of this soccer ball to choose from. I bought the middle size. Wasn't sure if it would be too small but ended up being the perfect size. My grandson is 3 and is quite interested in soccer already. This is a very sturdy ball and well put together! I was impressed with the quality of it. When he grows bigger I will purchase the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Helen from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: My Brother loves it
customer_reviews.text: I played soccer with my little Brother and he loves this ball. I bought this ball to play in the beach and for outdoor activities with family. It's affordable and a sturdy ball. Wilson also reminds me of Cast Away. Great movie if you haven't checked it out. This soccer ball is chill and kids will love it. I saw some pictures about how this ball falls apart after a few months. I can't provide my input on that yet because I've owned it for only a couple weeks. I'll report back if there's any cosmetic issues. I don't usually play soccer however after purchasing this I am more eager to play on my own or with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Durango

customer_reviews.title: Outer layer peels off
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for....my son LOVES that this is the traditional soccer ball but after only 4 months of use during the soccer season - the first layer is peeling from the seams. It looks shabby and cheap. It keeps the air in ok but it looks horrible. This is the second one we bought because my son LOVES this ball. I told him he needs to choose a different one next time, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miccio

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: The ball came apart in about 2 months... used by one kid... weird
customer_reviews.author: Cindycap

customer_reviews.title: My kods
customer_reviews.text: This ball is perfect size for my 4yr old and 6 yr old. They play all day. It is very well made. My puppy of 55lbs made a small bite on it and seem strong of a product. It has a was topping so good when it gets occasionally wet.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It arrived semi deflated. No big deal, I inflated it. The next day it was semi deflated again. When I shake the ball I can hear/feel that there’s an inner, slightly smaller “ball” inside that is loosely rolling around. I’m wondering if this is a rubber, bladder-like element that is defective and shouldn’t be disconnected from the outer shell. Is this why it can’t stay inflated?. No idea. I’m not returning this defective ball since my under three year old doesn’t care that it’s semi deflated, but I’d not buy this again and can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Schane

customer_reviews.title: Size 3 good for Samaritan's Purse shoe box if deflated
customer_reviews.text: I am using the soccer balls for my Samaritan's Purse shoe boxes for the oldest boys (age 14, I believe) as I read somewhere that boys around the world want most of all their own soccer ball. I deflated them in order to fit the size 3 into the box. I haven't reinflated to see how that goes, but grandsons enjoy playing with the couple of extras I ordered and those are holding up well. Of course, send a pump and extra needles, too.
customer_reviews.author: Eberyl Alford

customer_reviews.title: What you expect from a kids soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Quality, Recognizable, Right size for toddlers and young children, A soccer ball, No cons. Got this for the kids so they can learn the basics of soccer and stay active.
customer_reviews.author: awsengr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get our toddler away from the tv and be outside. He loves kicking the ball, its a good size for him, and nice to see him improve his kicks. The only issue is that we will also kick the ball on our drive way, however I've noticed that it does scuff up the ball when we do that, so not sure about the durability.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Operation Christmas child shoeboxes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three for Operation Christmas child. When deflated a size 5 fits in a shoe box with a pump and many other items(soap, toothbrush, toy car, socks, school supplies, etc). Perfect! I hope they bring joy to the recipients.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaMama

customer_reviews.title: ~~Delivered to my Door~~
customer_reviews.text: This soccer ball was purchased for my two Boxer pups to play with in the yard. They think it is quite the toy and after several months, it is still intact and at the original size. Really cute to watch them try to 'grip' it in their mouth and then the chase is on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at only....
customer_reviews.text: Within two days of playing soccer.... the material the ball is made of... which is not leather... started to tear and reveal a very, very, very thin coating of plastic covered foam.... durability for an item which soul purpose is to be kicked is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a week now and we have been playing outside with it and there are barely any scratches or anything ripped or not broken or popped like other soccer balls. I definitely think this is worth your money I got this for 12.59 and that is definitely worth your money. I would defiantly give this as a gift. I LOVE IT !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soccer ball for my son for Christmas. He has taken it to school every day for the 10 days they’ve been back in school since winter break. After 10 days, it already has huge scratches all over it and has one big chunk missing. So disappointed that I already need to buy him another ball.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: flat after one month!
customer_reviews.text: I had read other reviews of flat balls, but I decided to give it a try. The soccer ball arrived properly inflated so I was happy. However, after a month of sporadic play, it is flat. The outside seems to be intact, but the internal air reservoir/bladder no longer inflates. It is past amazon's return window by 2 days, but I am still going to try to get my money back since it is obviously defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made for a child's rough playing
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter got this ball today. We put her name on it and off she went to play. Within an hour the outside cover was torn with foam showing through. I thought it was better than that when I bought it. Now I will be going out to find her a better one since this was to be an Easter present.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: used ball
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball for a gift to my neighbor's son, and it arrived on the birtday date. The ball didn't have the original box around the ball, it was in a plastic bag, in a reused box. it didn't look professionlly boxed. unfortually I had it to give to the boy and apprologise for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this ball and the company who sells it
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I bought for my grandson leaked almost immediately and I was very discouraged, but I contacted the company and after returning that ball, they sent out a new one immediately and it has worked great for much of the summer. My grandson loves it and plays with his older brother a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rytebrain

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, reasonably priced ball. Very comfortable to kick around even with sneakers on. Soccer is a great way to get the kids out of the house, and even drag a few local neighbors into the game. Just find a flat grassy area and have fun kicking this thing around. Would serve well as a training ball too.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good practice ball for under $10.00 then this is one to consider. My kids love Wilson and the only equal is the Mitre. Don't waste your money on any other brand if your budget is under $10.00.
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: The fabric started to tear apart.
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was shiny and looked perfect. I saw pictures made by other customers and I thought their product might have been tore apart by their dogs. But it was not the case for me. We just played on lawn and the ball's assumed leather started to peel off in small pieces. That's a shame for the Wilson company with its high reputation.
customer_reviews.author: dazfa

customer_reviews.title: Fake Wilson Brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and the outer layer peeled after a couple of months playing by a 6 Yr old. It is not leather. . Looks like made with some sort of a artificial material with a thin plastic/ paper look a like skin. What a shame for Wison to allow this to happen under their Brandname.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sivakumar

customer_reviews.title: Great ball initially
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't got it outside yet, but it seems like a very good ball for the price. It is just soft enough, but not overly soft like some padded balls. It feels real good and the handling with shoes is nice. Will update with more usage. Seems to be stitched well though!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fine for knocking around. Definitely not a game ball.
customer_reviews.text: Easily scuffed and scratched this ball plays closer to a ten dollar ball, so I'm thankful that when the purchase was made I managed to catch it on sale for around ten US dollars or I would feel far more frustrated with this purchase. The stitching is sufficient, but clearly won't hold for long. This ball would not satisfy as a game ball, but makes a passable practice ball for personal use or rec league play. Even a serious league team would wear this ball out before the end of a season.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd soccer ball that I bought for my 3 year old grandson. The other 2 had to be inflated, leaked air and were just....junk. This ball is absolutely perfect for a toddler, who is just starting to show interest in soccer. It comes FULLY inflated and holds air. It has just the right amount of kick. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy and classic.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is old fashioned but sturdy. My club boys player beats this ball to no end and no scratches, no rips, solid seams. This ball has lasted longer than any other ball we have ever had. We usually go through 2-3 balls in a year. After Fall and WInter soccer, the WILSON is still solid.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable!
customer_reviews.text: We don't actually play any soccer, we got this as a large play toy for our German Shepherd for Christmas. I have to say I'm really impressed. It is now peeling and has teeth marks and indents all over it from rough play and is still completely inflated like day one. I'm sure for people actually buying it for soccer use, it will hold up even better!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play with my 4 year old son, and thank goodness for that. It is not quite round when inflated, and is small in size. It does not seem particularly well made. It serves my purpose, but I would definitely not have bought this if I had seen it in person.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain
customer_reviews.text: We purchase these to take to schools in Kenya and they seem to be very well put together and for a good price, We would buy these again. If this review has helped you please like it thanks
customer_reviews.author: GoodtoGo

customer_reviews.title: Me and my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I simply use the ball and kick around with my children. Had a great soccer player however my mom has to park down the road that has a bunch of soccer nets and Fields and so I took the kids down there and we had a blast. Not sure it is a regulation ball or not I did not allow my children to kick it on the pavement only in the grass. But it's a wonderful ball especially if you're just going to use it for recreational use! I would recommend the ball to anybody. I ordered the largest size!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can play soccer with it. Edit: 11/4/16 I bought another, far more expensive ball, from the store at the same time that I ordered this one. That ball blew out a stitch and this one is still going strong. (I did notice the price of the Wilson ball has more than doubled to $12.99 from when I bought it as an add on item for about $5.)
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the checkered black and white. It is for a Scottish Terrier I will be getting. They love to chase a big ball that they cannot bite. Perfect backyard action!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the kids to play with during quarantine. I was disappointed to see it arrived with a slit in the ball. Crossing my fingers it doesn’t reduce durability and that it will still last a long time, especially with the kids playing with it every day while school is out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: SOCCER BALL!
customer_reviews.text: It's a ball designed for kicking. I have kicked it multiple times and it does not care. It cost $12 and goes where you kick it. For my daughter and I playing in the back yard it is perfect. Actually way better than any ball I had as a child.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived flat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived flat. After putting air in it, you can hear the ball leaking air and within minutes, it’s flat again. I called Wilson and the refered me to the warranty form. I just want an even exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Rggm

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for tot's soccer
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase a size 3 soccer ball for my two year old's soccer club. I won't get into the efficacy of tot's soccer, but this ball fully met our needs. I'm a crafty mom so I cut vinyl and personalized the ball with her name. The ball was adequately bouncy and just the perfect size for our chaotic venture. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Meli J

customer_reviews.title: Not a good ball, leaky
customer_reviews.text: I got this “budget ball” for my daughter to practice with for her collegiate team. Within 1 week, it would no longer hold air. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: Ball came inflated and ready to play! My students were thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Scheliga

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Ball arrived deflated. After pumping, the ball deflated again by 1/3 of capacity within 10 minutes, audible hissing from one of the seams. Clearly a defective unit but does not instill confidence. Will be purchasing a different ball.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We needed the next size up in soccer balls. I wanted to be able to find a reasonably priced ball. This ball was a great price. This ball has lasted through a season of twice-weekly practices and weekly game days. I love that it came already inflated. That fact saved me time. We were able to take it right out of the box and go straight to soccer practice. No issues so far. We've been using it for 3 months and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Greer

customer_reviews.title: Slash in ball- used condition not as stated
customer_reviews.text: This ball was purchased used and only the packaging was supposed to be damaged. When it arrived it had a box cutter slash in the ball. It’s not all the way through so it still holds air but it will most likely eventually leak.
customer_reviews.author: L E

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter’s birthday, and it came wrinkly and deflated. I think it’s missing a piece too, because it looks like there should be something to stop the air from going out
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: WILSON! Classic colors and good looking ball. It is very slick and will fly if you kick it. I got this because it was cheap and my dog enjoys playing soccer with me. He basically will tear it up but that's why I got this cheap ball. Would be a good set for practice don't think I would reccomened for a game though.
customer_reviews.author: Norge

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY LARGE DOG
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and carries it around in his mouth all day. I play ball with him with it. My dog has had this for a long time now and has not bitten a hole in it YET. This is a wonderful ball for children also, it will not bust or come apart.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie moore

customer_reviews.title: Good ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great Soccer Ball for the grand-kids. The Soccer Goal we purchased came with a cheap, small, rubber soccer ball that was pretty much worthless .... expect for the smallest kid. This was purchased to replace it with something more normal.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rahm

customer_reviews.title: Wilson! Wiillllssssonnn!  It's a soccer ball...
customer_reviews.text: It will survive much longer than actual time your children will play with it. In fact, they will lose it and another family's offspring will enjoy it until they too will lose it....and the cycle will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Old-school ball. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is soccer ball. Simple, elegant, and regulation. It is surprisingly hard to find a decent old-school ball. They all have fancy patterns or they light up.... I wish the logo were smaller, but other than that, it is what a soccer ball should be.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for an eight-year-old boy- He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Need the perfect gift for my grandson Christmas. Making sure he didn’t play with it in the house was a challenge, but he loves it. We played with it for hours in the yard. Was a great idea for Christmas, and just a perfect gift in general. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: balls
customer_reviews.text: I got this ball for my dog because he's obsessed with balls... it didn't take him long to pop but it DID take him a while to completely destroy. Probably a month or so. Overall was definitely a good price for a month of play :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a soccer ball we could use outside on gravel or grass. This one seemed sturdy and was a good price. It actually works great outside. The stitching is complete, and the ball came ready to use out of the package. We would buy this soccer ball again.
customer_reviews.author: JT43

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a soccer ball. Durable. My son likes it. Good value for the money. Would buy again. And I am sure I will since he keeps losing them. Need one with a GPS in it but this one is ok until they make one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dikmen

customer_reviews.title: Dnt use with dogs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my goldendoodle, i know it is not intended to be for pets and teeth but the ball had to be tossed after just an hour. Plastic and foam pieces everywhere. If you are looking for your pet, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Pnw

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little ball
customer_reviews.text: This soccer ball is a lifeline, a therapist, a partner, and fun to teach to my 8 year old. Trap, set, pass, but when do I score goals I don’t want to pass....and also teach her how to be a one person team.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Value for money but it's
customer_reviews.text: The ball looks good,the price is good, but it is not strong and durable, the surface has been broken in many places after half a month, I had avoided buying Chinese made, worried about the quality is not good, the results of buying a Vietnam-made, also so, helpless ah!
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a classic looking ball, which it delivered on, however the ball is nowhere near as nice as an adidas or Nike ball in the same price range. If you are going for a “look” great ball, but if you are getting it to play soccer, there are better ones out there in the same price range!
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Got it for the dog!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is unusual but I got it for my dog, a boxer/German shepherd mix. He's a heavy chewer and it's been a month and the surface is looking rough, but he hasn't been able to puncture it yet. If it can survive the dog, it's a very durable ball.
customer_reviews.author: D Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer ball, exterior not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for about a week before it started tearing. We don't leave it outside so was a bit disappointed. Overall, still a good soccer ball for the kids.. We are still kicking it around today (had it about 2 months now)
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Lost air
customer_reviews.text: Just received the ball partially deflated (to the point the ball won't bounce on a hard surface). The other ball (Spalding) I received together was fully inflated, so I assume this one won't hold air very well? Will keep an eye on this for a few days and return if it loses air too quick.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDwellerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Best grandma
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my grandson along with the portable soccer goal. He absolutely loves playing soccer in the backyard! The ball is very durable and was reasonably priced. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Dog toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball as a pet toy for my 15 lbs. Westie. She's got it pretty much in tatters now, but loves it. And despite the abuse it's still inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball Size and fun for the yard or park!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who isn’t quite 3. It’s bigger than the size recommendation (one size up) but I think it’s great for kicking around with her. smaller would be better for just kids but this is a great adult:kid ball.
customer_reviews.author: K Wells

customer_reviews.title: This one is slick & shiny.
customer_reviews.text: First one leaked from day one. Return was easy and quick. No problems. Replacement was fine. If you want one with a bit of texture to the surface, find something else. This one's slick and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: John Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great soccer ball. I like how the sizes correlate with the age of the child. I ordered a size up because my five year is on the taller/heavier side and it was perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Two days usage and got a puncture. Seem not to be designed for kicking if it cannot be kicked around for fear of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Leaked at first pump
customer_reviews.text: The body of the soccer ball actually seems great, but after pumping it up even a little I could hear air rushing out around the hole for the needle. I was able to pump it up enough and stick some tape on it, but isn't a lasting or ideal solution.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: small size but ok for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Size 3 is smaller than i expected but works well for my 6 yr old. We've been having fun practicing before her first soccer practice. It seems durable enough. Came fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rishmawi

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This ball was purchased for my daughter who has fallen in love with the game!! She started last fall and has been into soccer ever since, we did her whole birthday soccer themed. The ball it's self came nicely packaged and it feels strong (Nice and Round) (Black and White), due to the horrible rains we been having she hasn't been able to play with it as much as she would like. She asked for a classic and thats what she got!!! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: NoGood

customer_reviews.title: Leaking air.
customer_reviews.text: The price is cheap but the quality is not good. The ball was leaking air immediately after pumping it. You can hear the hissing sound of air leaking. Maybe it's just this ball. I'm going to order another one to try.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold pressure
customer_reviews.text: This ball arrived severely flattened. We pumped it up and it lost pressure after only a few days. It looks like I’ll need to pump it up before each practice and game.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good ball until the dog gets it
customer_reviews.text: My husband grew up playing soccer and wanted something to kick around for old times sack. Size 5 is your adult sized ball. Unfortunately out corgi decided he was going to go back to his British roots and bit the ball within 2 mins. Purchased a second one so my husband could have one lol. This is a really good ball it's just not gonna withstand a dog bite lol.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Defective ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is much bigger than a size 5. My son's coach jokes that it is a size 7! If purchasing for soccer, get your ball elsewhere. It was given to our dogs to play with since we had to get another ball.
customer_reviews.author: chongcuz

product_meta.title: Wilson Traditional Soccer Ball
product_meta.description: For soccer purists, The Traditional is the first choice for the backyard, street or pitch. This machine-sewn ball has the classic black and white panel design and performance for any and every match.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather cover for increased durability
Butyl rubber bladder for excellent air and shape retention
Traditional panel graphics with silver ACcents

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
